title: Fix: Blue border appears around `Pressable` when press `Tab`

comments.body: @Ollyws Please copy/paste the Reviewer Checklist from [here](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Expensify/App/main/contributingGuides/REVIEWER_CHECKLIST.md) into a new comment on this PR and complete it. If you have the K2 extension, you can simply click: [this button]

body:
<!-- If necessary, assign reviewers that know the area or changes well. Feel free to tag any additional reviewers you see fit. -->

### Details
<!-- Explanation of the change or anything fishy that is going on -->

Pressing `Tab` key to navigate leads to blue border around `Pressable`. Requires pressing it twice to actually focus the text input inside it. This PR fixes that.
